name: Melty's Christmas Adventure
description:
Play as a magical snowman tasked with saving this year's Christmas. Navigate the map, collect gifts and leave them at people's doors.

Credits :

- Brackeys : For his great tutorials.

- Kenney : For the amazing and free asset packs.

- AShamaluevMusic : Christmas Rock - Background Music.

- Scott Holmes Music : This is Christmas - Background Music.

- Opengameart : Sound effects.

Programming and character/world design was made by me during the 5 days of the development winter jam.
